head.title: Arts, Briefly; San Francisco Opera Names Music Director

hedline.hl1: Arts, Briefly; San Francisco Opera Names Music Director

body.head.byline: By DANIEL J. WAKIN; Compiled by Lawrence Van Gelder

abstract.p: Nicola Luisotti is named music director of San Francisco Opera for 2009-2010 season, replacing Donald Runnicles (S)

block.p: Nicola Luisotti, an up-and-coming Italian conductor, will become the new music director of the San Francisco Opera, the company said yesterday. Mr. Luisotti, 45, will assume the job for the 2009-10 season. He will take over for Donald Runnicles, whose contract expires the previous season. Mr. Luisotti, who early in his career was a staff conductor at the Teatro alla Scala in Milan, recently made debuts with the Metropolitan Opera, Seattle Opera and Los Angeles Opera.
